title: Castaway
description: Work with your server to escape the island. The bot was rewritten from scratch to make way for more core functions like skills.

title: RSM
description: RSM 1.2 Has been released, with many more features than before. With new commands like `m!verify`, moderating your server is easier than before.

title: GPS
description: A full rewrite of the bot - Every feature is being remade with new ui, fancy new commands, and all new cards.
